about_the_game:
In a world full of monsters, always look for better weapons & skillstones that gain your enemy's ability. Even you can spit poison like the poisonous spider, so slash all of them and look for it. Sharpen your weapon, upgrade your status, and gain experience until you become a Professional Mercenary in this single-player, Action RPG, Hack n Slash Game.

Hunt and Slash Your Enemies!

As a Mercenary, slashing your enemy is a top priority. Hunt them, slash them all, and hopefully, they drop something good for you.

Look for better weapons

On your future quests, stronger monsters might be hard to deal with. Prepare yourself by looking for stronger weapons that can be obtained from the market or monster drops. There are 30+ weapons you can choose from Three types, each of which has its advantages. One-Handed, Two-Handed, or Spear. 

Upgrade things

Sharpen your weapon, upgrade your character status, upgrade your character Inventory, and gain experience until you become a Professional Mercenary and master the way of monster slaying.

Use Skillstones

Many monsters have the ability to do something. Poison spitting, Teleporting behind your back, Diving on the land, Dashing, and many more cunning abilities, but you're able to do that if you use a Skillstone. There are 40+ Skillstones that can change the way you approach your enemy. Master it and become stronger!

Pet Monsters

Look for a young monster and put it in a cage but don't forget to feed it properly...

Features

  • Lot of monsters with different abilities that can be mastered.

  • 30+ Weapons to use. One-handed Sword, Two-handed Sword, or Spear? choose wisely.

  • 40+ Skillstones to master. Poison spitting, summoning, and much more can be mastered using skillstones.

  • Many things to upgrade! Your weapons, potions, inventory, and your character are upgradeable.

  • Pettable monsters! Monsters can become your pet if you find them young.
